content: 17/18th stitch main body of the hat beginning at round1 work the 16 row of chart a twice each panel is repeated four times across the round now work all the rounds of chart b to the end 12st remaining break yarn and thread the tail through a darning needle thread the needle through the remaining stitches pull tight and secure weave in ends chart a chart b left hat knit in 2 strands of drops flora light fingering held together on 3 25mm needles circumference 17 43cm unstretched and unblocked depth from cast on to crown 9¾ 25cm right hat knit in drops karisma dk on 3 25mm needles circumference 18 46cm unstretched and unblocked depth from cast on 10¼ 26cm images of frank meadow sutcliffe s superb photographs of victorian fisherfolk of the north east coast are reproduced here by kind permission of the sutcliffe gallery prints can be purchased online from http //www sutcliffe-gallery co uk © janet stimson 2020
